#summary Read before installing

For Version 1.0.0 :
Install, and Open Config/Config.ini


For Version 1.1.1 :

= Installation Guide =

== 1. Download ==

Download latest release from Google Code : http://code.google.com/p/phpmemcacheadmin/downloads/list

== 2. Install it on an Apache/PHP server ==

*Make sure that Apache have the right to read and write in the temp file folder Temp/*


== 3. Go to Menu > Edit Configuration ==

http://www.elijaa.org/blog/public/phpMemCacheAdmin_configuration.png

Remember to Save after each part configuration

=== Commands Configuration ===
Each command executed by phpMemCacheAdmin will use an API, you can choose it here

Some recommendations :

 * Use Server for stats, slabs, items
 * PECL Memcached does not support the slabs and items commands
 * If you're using PECL Memcache in your scripts, don't use PECL Memcache, same thing for PECL Memcached
 * PECL Memcache can't use delay with flush_all

If you don't use any of the PECL Package, simply let "Server" for every configuration key

Some more informations about configuration keys

 * Stats : Used to extract stats from server
 * Slabs : Used to extract slabs stats from server
 * Items : Used to extract slabs items from server
 * Get : Used to extract an item by his key
 * Set : Used to set an item
 * Delete : Used to delete an item
 * Flush All : Used to flush a server


=== Server List ===

By default there is only a localhost:11211, you can add your server or instance on same server by typing hostname:port


=== Miscellaneous Configuration ===

You can define here :

 * Timeout : Timeout when trying to connect to a memcache server
 * Max Items : Max items to dump when showing a slab items list


=== Live Stats Configuration ===
Live stats is a top like application, to show your servers stats

 * Refresh Rate : Stats refresh rate in second
 * Memory Alert : Memory % for alert
 * Hit Rate Alert : Hit Rate alert in %
 * Eviction Alert : Eviction Alert in %
 * Temp Path : Path for cache file, must be writable by apache
